label: Ryse
content:
Visit: http://www.xbox.com/en-US/xbox-one/games/ryse

Ryse is an Xbox One game that showcases one of the many interactive campaign landing experiences that were created under my leadership as development lead for Xbox.com while at Razorfish. It featured an interactive comic book experience, and a 3d visualizer of the main character's attack moves, among other things.
